The claim originated from a Reddit post: Comet Ping Pong - Pizzagate Summary" on the subreddit r/The_Donald, a community of Donald Trump supporters.
The owner of Comet Ping Pong: James Alefantis, has prominent Democratic friends but has never met Hillary Clinton, does not sell or abuse children, and is not under investigation by law enforcement for any of the claims.
The original: Pizzagate" post, which detailed the conspiracy theory, was deleted but archived versions of it exist. A subreddit dedicated to the controversy, r/pizzagate, was also created.
The evidence used to support the claim i: creepy murals, nude women murals, graffiti relating to sex, positive reviews mentioning unsupervised children, and the inclusion of a pedophilic symbol in the restaurant's menu and neighboring businesses' signs and decorations.
